summary: This is the visual setting I'm working on
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]hGL4UO3CDdE[/youtube]

[youtube]EBC6aS-WLac[/youtube]


[youtube]1LIg-opnNT0[/youtube]


[youtube]MfZKnDs2_f0[/youtube]


[youtube]5fcv3F0cExM[/youtube][/center][left]This is the visual environment in which I am working, is still under test but is already playable.
I have based on my study as a visual designer to carefully choose the effects and above all the illuminations.
Here are the steps to follow IF YOU WANT IT TO BE THE SAME AS IN THE SCREENSHOT:[/left]

[b][u][color=#ff7700]1- CALIBRATE YOUR MONITOR, USING REFERENCE THE CALIBRATION IMAGE TO BE ADJUNTED WITH THE FILE. RECOMMENDATIONS USING THE CONFIGURATION DRIVER PANEL.[/color][/u][/b]

2- DOWNLOAD ENHANCED LIGHT AND EFFECT (THIS CONFIGURATION WAS DESIGNED WITH THIS MOD) -[color=#a4c2f4]INSTALL IT: ACTIVATE EXTERIORS AND ENHANCER[/color]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?[/url]

3- Finally delete any trace of enb, then copy my files and paste it into the root folder of the game.
Then download the latest version of enb series copy the files d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe and paste them in that folder as well.
They will enjoy.
author: Willow
